sentences: Neiu aitas meestel ajasid 채ra hoida.
J채채davad ajasid, kuid see oli liiga palju.
Tema juuksed aitasid tal p천genemisel neist ajasid tagasi hoida.
context: 'Ajasid' is the past tense plural form of 'aja', which means to beat or to hit. It commonly refers to physical attacks, such as someone beating another person with their fists, but can also refer to animals or objects striking something repeatedly.
